help.title: Help Center
help.intro: Welcome to Taskify's Help Center! Here you'll find answers to common questions about using our application.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.content: To start using Taskify, log in to your account. If you don't have one, you can easily register. Once logged in, your inbox will be ready for your first tasks.

addTask.title: Adding a New Task
addTask.content: Click the 'Add Task' button in the sidebar. In the dialog box, you can enter a task title, description, additional content, due date, and assign it to other users. The title is the only required field.

navigation.title: Navigating the App
navigation.inboxDesc: Here you'll find all your tasks that are not yet completed and do not have a specific 'today' or 'upcoming' due date.
navigation.todayDesc: Displays tasks that are due today. Ideal for a quick overview of your daily priorities.
navigation.upcomingDesc: Contains tasks with future due dates, allowing you to plan ahead.
navigation.completedDesc: A list of all tasks you've marked as done. You can review them here and, if needed, mark them as uncompleted.
navigation.calendarDesc: A calendar view that allows you to browse tasks assigned to specific days. Helps visualize your schedule.

settings.title: Settings and Profile
settings.content: In the 'Settings' section, you can manage your nickname, language preferences, app theme (light/dark), age, and gender. The 'Profile' section allows you to change your profile picture and review basic account details.
